title: Xayah/Rakan Bundle Question
body: So I'm getting Xayah as a gift today from a friend and a 3500 RP card from the store, but since the bundle is 3600 something RP, I wanted to check something. So if I already have Xayah, does the RP from the bundle that accounts for buying her get removed or is it still the same price? I won't be able to afford the bundle if it doesn't, so I just wanted to be sure so I could save my RP for later since I can only afford a $25 card now. Thanks!

replies.body: These bundles  should be flexible, so it should discount based on what you've already unlocked.  For example, the Cosmic Dusk and Dawn Bundle is 3675 RP in total.  Since I already have the champions but not the skins, it's 2701 for me instead.  Let me know if that clears things up!
